Scribbles of a blind scientist

The Project27 Guide is a descriptive guide on how to do tasks, I once learnt how to do. Sadly, unless practice follows learning, all knowledge fades. The key objective of the Guide is to mitigate fading of knowledge in unpracticed tasks, by providing a quick guide of specific topics.

Science collection

The Project27 Science collection is a collection of volumes on mathematical and physical sciences, computer literacy, and statistics.

Why are these specific volumes included in the Project27 Science collection?

Because science is cool.

Mathematical and Physical Sciences (MPS)

MPS is a volume of notes on topics of mathematics and physics.

Open the MPS volume

Computer Literacy

Computer Literacy is a volume of notes on how to do small, practical tasks on the computer, in context of studying, researching, and publishing scientific content.

Open the Computer Literacy volume

Statistics

Statistics is a volume of notes on statistical methods.

Open the Statistics volume

Lifestyle collection

The Lifestyle collection is a collection of volumes on cooking, journalism, and human relationships.

Why are these specific volumes included in the Project27 Lifestyle collection?

Because lifestyle matters.

CookBook

CookBook is a volume of recipes from the Project27 author household.

Open the cookbook

Vocal

Vocal is an album of short biographies and audio recorded conversations with family, friends, and acquaintances of the Project27 author. The album's key objective is to portray multiple life stories and honour the storytellers.

Open the vocal album

The Project27 site was last updated on: 08 May 2021.
